data.text: @CRNAfarmer Definitely creating more pressure to change. At same time, Canada has already taken several more substantive steps over last 10 years toward making it easier for US wheat to come north (end of KVD, CWB, variety registration changes.) Grading is mainly optics.
@RealAg_Kelvin It is happening now because people are taking our Administration seriously on trade issues. If it was no big deal would have been done years ago
@CRNAfarmer Just hasn't been a high-enough priority for federal govt to push it through Parliament.  A NAFTA 2.0 deal would provide path for it.
@RealAg_Kelvin If that's the case why wasn't it resolved years ago?
